general information: Marketing Information The RACKCONS1716 1U 17" Rack Mount LCD Console with Integrated 16 Port KVM Switch provides centralized control for servers and KVM switches with an integrated 16 port KVM switch, a 17-inch LCD monitor, full 106-key keyboard and touchpad neatly combined into 1U of space in any standard rack or cabinet 30in (or greater) in depth.A secure solution, the rack-mount console includes a key-lock mechanism as well as individual port password protection for preventing unauthorized access. When not in use, it's as simple as folding the LCD display and sliding it back into the rack on the sturdy mounting rails (included).A highly-scalable server control solution, the rack console can control up to 136 computers by cascading 8 additional 16 port KVM switches. For added versatility, the console is compatible with virtually any existing KVM switch as well as with most PC, Mac and Sun systems.Backed by a Startech 2-year warranty and free lifetime technical support.
miscellaneous: Package Contents 1U 17in Rackmount LCD Rack Console with Integrated 16 Port KVM SwitchPower Adapter
